CreateActivity.name: CreateActivity
CreateActivity.description: Grants permission to create an activity

CreateStateMachine.name: CreateStateMachine
CreateStateMachine.description: Grants permission to create a state machine

CreateStateMachineAlias.name: CreateStateMachineAlias
CreateStateMachineAlias.description: Grants permission to create a state machine alias

DeleteActivity.name: DeleteActivity
DeleteActivity.description: Grants permission to delete an activity

DeleteStateMachine.name: DeleteStateMachine
DeleteStateMachine.description: Grants permission to delete a state machine

DeleteStateMachineAlias.name: DeleteStateMachineAlias
DeleteStateMachineAlias.description: Grants permission to delete a state machine alias

DeleteStateMachineVersion.name: DeleteStateMachineVersion
DeleteStateMachineVersion.description: Grants permission to delete a state machine version

DescribeActivity.name: DescribeActivity
DescribeActivity.description: Grants permission to describe an activity

DescribeExecution.name: DescribeExecution
DescribeExecution.description: Grants permission to describe an execution

DescribeMapRun.name: DescribeMapRun
DescribeMapRun.description: Grants permission to describe a map run

DescribeStateMachine.name: DescribeStateMachine
DescribeStateMachine.description: Grants permission to describe a state machine

DescribeStateMachineAlias.name: DescribeStateMachineAlias
DescribeStateMachineAlias.description: Grants permission to describe a state machine alias

DescribeStateMachineForExecution.name: DescribeStateMachineForExecution
DescribeStateMachineForExecution.description: Grants permission to describe the state machine for an execution

GetActivityTask.name: GetActivityTask
GetActivityTask.description: Grants permission to be used by workers to retrieve a task (with the specified activity ARN) which has been scheduled for execution by a running state machine

GetExecutionHistory.name: GetExecutionHistory
GetExecutionHistory.description: Grants permission to return the history of the specified execution as a list of events

InvokeHTTPEndpoint.name: InvokeHTTPEndpoint
InvokeHTTPEndpoint.description: Grants permission to invoke the HTTP Task state

ListActivities.name: ListActivities
ListActivities.description: Grants permission to list the existing activities

ListExecutions.name: ListExecutions
ListExecutions.description: Grants permission to list the executions of a state machine

ListMapRuns.name: ListMapRuns
ListMapRuns.description: Grants permission to list the map runs of an execution

ListStateMachineAliases.name: ListStateMachineAliases
ListStateMachineAliases.description: Grants permission to list the aliases of a state machine

ListStateMachineVersions.name: ListStateMachineVersions
ListStateMachineVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a state machine

ListStateMachines.name: ListStateMachines
ListStateMachines.description: Grants permission to lists the existing state machines

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an AWS Step Functions resource

PublishStateMachineVersion.name: PublishStateMachineVersion
PublishStateMachineVersion.description: Grants permission to publish a state machine version

RedriveExecution.name: RedriveExecution
RedriveExecution.description: Grants permission to redrive an execution

RevealSecrets.name: RevealSecrets
RevealSecrets.description: Grants permission to reveal sensitive data from an execution

SendTaskFailure.name: SendTaskFailure
SendTaskFailure.description: Grants permission to report that the task identified by the taskToken failed

SendTaskHeartbeat.name: SendTaskHeartbeat
SendTaskHeartbeat.description: Grants permission to report to the service that the task represented by the specified taskToken is still making progress

SendTaskSuccess.name: SendTaskSuccess
SendTaskSuccess.description: Grants permission to report that the task identified by the taskToken completed successfully

StartExecution.name: StartExecution
StartExecution.description: Grants permission to start a state machine execution

StartSyncExecution.name: StartSyncExecution
StartSyncExecution.description: Grants permission to start a Synchronous Express state machine execution

StopExecution.name: StopExecution
StopExecution.description: Grants permission to stop an execution

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag an AWS Step Functions resource

TestState.name: TestState
TestState.description: Grants permission to test a state machine definition

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from an AWS Step Functions resource

UpdateMapRun.name: UpdateMapRun
UpdateMapRun.description: Grants permission to update a map run

UpdateStateMachine.name: UpdateStateMachine
UpdateStateMachine.description: Grants permission to update a state machine

UpdateStateMachineAlias.name: UpdateStateMachineAlias
UpdateStateMachineAlias.description: Grants permission to update a state machine alias

ValidateStateMachineDefinition.name: ValidateStateMachineDefinition
ValidateStateMachineDefinition.description: Grants permission to validate a state machine definition
